name: Robber's Connection
description:
A short preview of the game:

Description:

Prepare yourself for the Central City heist by having some practice in the Heist training grounds. Learn the basics before going to the main missions. 

Ensure that you are connected with the robot. Fix everything to make the game easier.

How to Play:

Use WASD in your keyboard to play the game.

Use F to interact with the objects

Use Esc to Open the Menu bar.

Triggers:

Fix the Robot by selecting the buttons indicated by the following at the bottom right.

Choose the room where the robot is located/turn the buttons to green.

The game is available in both browser and Windows.

Background:

This game is solo developed  but, some of the assets used are from other developers placed in the Credit Scene. Some of the assets are slightly tweaked to match the theme of the game.  The set-up looks the same as previous game jams but the look and feel is changed.

Expected Play Time is less than 10 minutes :) 

I hope you enjoy the game! Don't forget to add some feedback and ratings as well :D
